conversations.body_text: Hi Alex Yu,  You’ll need to purchase our PlusX controller, a separate 24V power supply, and the motor individually, as their controller is not compatible.

So my order should be ok if I purchase a separate power supply, correct?

On Wed, Jun 18, 2025 at 4:58 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Alex Yu,  There’s no issue with purchasing a 24V 2.75–3A power supply separately. However, if you’re using Simjack pedals, you should be using the PlusX controller instead of the ProX Ultra, as their connectors are different. Could it be that you ordered the wrong model?

You are saying I can plug my Simjack pedals directly into the PlusX control
box?

On Sat, Jun 21, 2025 at 10:41 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Alex Yu,     Yes, our control box is compatible with SIMJACK pedals.

Is it too late to change the order to PlusX control box?

On Sun, Jun 22, 2025 at 12:26 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Alex Yu,     It’s a bit late—the order has already been shipped. I’ll check the details on Monday and see how I can assist you further.

Ok sounds good thanks

On Sun, Jun 22, 2025 at 12:30 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Alex Yu,  We will get back to you tomorrow.​

Thanks

On Wed, Jun 25, 2025 at 10:19 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi, I received my order but it is missing the adapter plate for throttle
and brake pedals

Hi, any updates? I still need the adapter plates for the throttle and brake
pedals. Also, how can I exchange the Pro X Ultra for Plus X control box?

Thanks,
Alex.
Hi Alex Yu,      If you're using Simjack pedals, you’ll need to place a new order for a PlusX controller. We will also send you a motor bracket kit as a complimentary addition.

Hi Alex Yu,    Sorry for the misunderstanding, the control box you received can be used directly, you don't need to buy extra. Also, you don't get the adapter board with a separate purchase of a motor.

Can I buy 2x adapter board separately?

On Wed, Jul 2, 2025 at 6:44 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Alex Yu,   Sure, you just need to purchase a separate power supply.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351007297850
Hi Alex Yu,     You can buy two elastomers and make a note and we will ship you the two adapter boards you need.   https://www.simsonn.com/products/elastomer
